desc: Inertia Wave is the number 1 metabolic conditioning tool. The Inertia Wave is a High Intensity Interval Training (HIIT) specifically designed to build a stronger core and enhance your speed, stamina, and strength. It is far superior to Battle Ropes or jump ropes, the Inertia Wave out-performs the competition..

layout.text: Inertia Wave is a safer and more effective alternative to traditional battle ropes training.
